attributes.action: Cancel parliament summer recess to deal with covid assistance for businesses.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament must remain in session and respond to the needs of the millions of people that will lose their businesses, their homes, their livelihoods before it is too late.
attributes.background: More than 300k businesses, more than 3 million sole traders are need financial assistance due to being unable to work during lockdown & more than 200k businesses cannot access bounce back loans. Parliament must not take a summer recess while this disaster still affects millions of people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332743
